channel.title: Server keeps repeating this
channel.description:
Something to do with Voting or Hiscores I think, server used to have this. I used to know how to fix it...
[code]The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,381,557,908,309 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
